attributes.action: carry out more maintenance on roads in Sussex.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every other county in the UK has better quality roads than us in Sussex.
We may have a higher volume of traffic but every one of those cars pays road tax so surely we are all contributing to the ever growing pot.
Compared to mainland Europe, our road infrastructure is shocking.  

Europeans would never stand for it, WHY DO WE???
